name: DFinsupp.small
initialProofState:
ι : Type u
π : ι → Type v
inst✝² : (i : ι) → Zero (π i)
inst✝¹ : Small.{w, u} ι
inst✝ : ∀ (i : ι), Small.{w, v} (π i)
⊢ Small.{w, max v u} (DFinsupp π)
decl:
instance DFinsupp.small [Small.{w} ι] [∀ (i : ι), Small.{w} (π i)] :
    Small.{w} (DFinsupp π) := small_of_injective (f := fun x j ↦ x j) (fun f f' eq ↦ by
      ext j
      exact congr_fun eq j)
